column5: Sapphire One & Only Luxury Beachfront Bungalow Stunning crown jewel of Bungalow Row at South Padre`s 5 star Sapphire Resort is offered for weekly, monthly or a minimum of 3 nights for rental. Property description Saturday to Saturday Stays  Please note there will be an additional resort fee of $15 per day
